aboutus-section.label: About Us
aboutus-section.title: Peduli Ilmu Foundation of Central Sulawesi

description.desc-1:
The Central Sulawesi Care Foundation was founded with a noble vision to develop quality Islamic education in the Central Sulawesi region. 
We are committed to producing a generation that is not only intellectually intelligent, but also has noble character.
description.desc-2:
Since its establishment, this foundation has carried out various education and da'wah programs that have a positive impact on the community. 
With the support of donors and volunteers who care, we continue to make the best contribution to the progress of Islamic education in Indonesia.
description.desc-3: Our programs are designed to meet the needs of comprehensive Islamic education, ranging from formal education in Islamic boarding schools to community learning programs that are open to the general public.

visimisi-section.title: Vision
visimisi-section.visi: Being an superior Islamic educational institution in printing a generation of knowledgeable, noble character, and able to contribute positively to the progress of the people and nation.

misions.misi-1: Organizing quality and integrated Islamic education

misions.misi-3: Empowering the community through social and economic programs
misions.misi-4: Build a network of cooperation with various parties for the advancement of education
